headline: Craig-Hallum Reiterates a Buy Rating on Anterix (ATEX)
summary: Anterix Inc (NASDAQ:ATEX) is one of the 13 Small Cap Stocks Analysts Are Bullish On. On April 10, Craig-Hallum analyst George Sutton maintained a Buy rating on Anterix Inc (NASDAQ:ATEX) without a price target. The company’s fiscal Q3 2025 results showed cash and cash equivalents of $28.8 million as of December 31, 2024. It also […]
